00027 #include <stdio.h>

00034 struct pkt_hdr {
00035         uint8_t magic[2];
00036         uint8_t pad;
00037         uint8_t flag;
00038         uint8_t unk1;
00039         uint8_t seq;
00040         uint8_t unk2;
00041         uint8_t unk3;
00042         uint32_t timestamp;
00043 };
00044 
00045 extern const struct caminit inits[];
00046 extern const int num_inits;
00047 
00048 static int stream_process(packet_stream *strm, uint8_t *pkt, int len)
00049 {
00050         if (len < 12)
00051                 return 0;
00052 
00053         struct pkt_hdr *hdr = (void*)pkt;
00054         uint8_t *data = pkt + sizeof(*hdr);
00055         int datalen = len - sizeof(*hdr);
00056 
00057         if (hdr->magic[0] != 'R' || hdr->magic[1] != 'B') {
00058                 //printf("[Stream %02x] Invalid magic %02x%02x\n", strm->flag, hdr->magic[0], hdr->magic[1]);
00059                 return 0;
00060         }
00061 
00062         //printf("[Stream %02x] %02x\n", strm->flag, hdr->flag);
00063 
00064         uint8_t sof = strm->flag|1;
00065         uint8_t mof = strm->flag|2;
00066         uint8_t eof = strm->flag|5;
00067 
00068         // sync if required, dropping packets until SOF
00069         if (!strm->synced) {
00070                 if (hdr->flag != sof) {
00071                         //printf("[Stream %02x] not synced yet...\n", strm->flag);
00072                         return 0;
00073                 }
00074                 strm->synced = 1;
00075                 strm->seq = hdr->seq;
00076                 strm->pkt_num = 0;
00077                 strm->valid_pkts = 0;
00078                 strm->got_pkts = 0;
00079         }
00080 
00081         int got_frame = 0;
00082 
00083         // handle lost packets
00084         if (strm->seq != hdr->seq) {
00085                 uint8_t lost = strm->seq - hdr->seq;
00086                 //printf("[Stream %02x] lost %d packets\n", strm->flag, lost);
00087                 if (lost > 5) {
00088                         //printf("[Stream %02x] lost too many packets, resyncing...\n", strm->flag);
00089                         strm->synced = 0;
00090                         return 0;
00091                 }
00092                 strm->seq = hdr->seq;
00093                 int left = strm->pkts_per_frame - strm->pkt_num;
00094                 if (left <= lost) {
00095                         strm->pkt_num = lost - left;
00096                         strm->valid_pkts = strm->got_pkts;
00097                         strm->got_pkts = 0;
00098                         got_frame = 1;
00099                         strm->timestamp = strm->last_timestamp;
00100                 } else {
00101                         strm->pkt_num += lost;
00102                 }
00103         }
00104 
00105         // check the header to make sure it's what we expect
00106         if (!(strm->pkt_num == 0 && hdr->flag == sof) &&
00107             !(strm->pkt_num == strm->pkts_per_frame-1 && hdr->flag == eof) &&
00108             !(strm->pkt_num > 0 && strm->pkt_num < strm->pkts_per_frame-1 && hdr->flag == mof)) {
00109                 //printf("[Stream %02x] Inconsistent flag %02x with %d packets in buf (%d total), resyncing...\n",
00110                 //       strm->flag, hdr->flag, strm->pkt_num, strm->pkts_per_frame);
00111                 strm->synced = 0;
00112                 return 0;
00113         }
00114 
00115         // copy data
00116         if (datalen > strm->pkt_size) {
00117                 //printf("[Stream %02x] Expected %d data bytes, but got %d. Dropping...\n", strm->flag, strm->pkt_size, datalen);
00118                 return 0;
00119         }
00120 
00121         //if (datalen != strm->pkt_size && hdr->flag != eof)
00122                 //printf("[Stream %02x] Expected %d data bytes, but got only %d\n", strm->flag, strm->pkt_size, datalen);
00123 
00124         uint8_t *dbuf = strm->buf + strm->pkt_num * strm->pkt_size;
00125         memcpy(dbuf, data, datalen);
00126 
00127         strm->pkt_num++;
00128         strm->seq++;
00129         strm->got_pkts++;
00130 
00131         strm->last_timestamp = hdr->timestamp;
00132 
00133         if (strm->pkt_num == strm->pkts_per_frame) {
00134                 strm->pkt_num = 0;
00135                 strm->valid_pkts = strm->got_pkts;
00136                 strm->got_pkts = 0;
00137                 strm->timestamp = hdr->timestamp;
00138                 return 1;
00139         } else {
00140                 return got_frame;
00141         }
00142 }
00143 
00144 // Unpack buffer of (vw bit) data into padded 16bit buffer.
00145 #define CONVERT_PACKED_BUFFER_TO_16_BIT(depth_raw, depth_frame, vw) {\
00146                 const int mask = (1 << vw) - 1; \
00147                 int i; \
00148                 int bitshift = 0; \
00149                 for (i=0; i<(640*480); i++) { \
00150                         int idx = (i*vw)/8; \
00151                         uint32_t word = (depth_raw[idx]<<(16)) | (depth_raw[idx+1]<<8) | depth_raw[idx+2]; \
00152                         depth_frame[i] = ((word >> (((3*8)-vw)-bitshift)) & mask); \
00153                         bitshift = (bitshift + vw) % 8; \
00154                 } \
00155 }
00156 
00157 int depthImageIdx[FREENECT_FRAME_PIX];
00158 uint8_t depthImageBitShift[FREENECT_FRAME_PIX];
00159 
00160 static void init_lookups()
00161 {
00162   int i;
00163   int bitshift = 0; 
00164   for(i=0; i<FREENECT_FRAME_PIX; i++){
00165     depthImageIdx[i] = (i*11)/8;
00166     depthImageBitShift[i] = 13-bitshift;
00167     bitshift = (bitshift + 11) % 8; 
00168   }
00169 }
00170 
00171 uint16_t unpack_depth(uint8_t* depth_raw, int row, int column)
00172 {
00173   const int mask = 0x7FF;
00174   unsigned int idx = row*FREENECT_FRAME_W + column;
00175   if(idx>FREENECT_FRAME_PIX-1)
00176     return 0;
00177   
00178   int rawidx = depthImageIdx[idx]; 
00179   int bitshift = depthImageBitShift[idx];
00180   uint32_t word = (depth_raw[rawidx]<<(16)) | (depth_raw[rawidx+1]<<8) | depth_raw[rawidx+2]; 
00181   uint16_t depth = ((word >> (13-bitshift)) & mask);
00182   return depth;
00183 }
00184 
00185 static inline void unpack(uint8_t* depth_raw, uint16_t*depth_frame)
00186 {
00187   int d0, d1, d2;
00188   __asm__ __volatile__(
00189     "1:\tlodsb\n\t"
00190     "stosb\n\t"
00191     "testb %%al,%%al\n\t"
00192     "jne 1b"
00193   : "=&S" (d0), "=&D" (d1), "=&a" (d2)
00194   : "0" (depth_raw),"1" (depth_frame) 
00195   : "memory");
00196   return;
00197 }
00198 
00199 static void depth_process(freenect_device *dev, uint8_t *pkt, int len)
00200 {
00201         if (len == 0)
00202                 return;
00203 
00204         int got_frame = stream_process(&dev->depth_stream, pkt, len);
00205 
00206         if (!got_frame)
00207                 return;
00208 
00209         //printf("GOT DEPTH FRAME %d/%d packets arrived, TS %08x\n",
00210         //      dev->depth_stream.valid_pkts, dev->depth_stream.pkts_per_frame, dev->depth_stream.timestamp);
00211   
00212   if (dev->depth_raw_cb){
00213     dev->depth_raw_cb(dev,dev->depth_raw, dev->depth_stream.timestamp);
00214     return;
00215   }
00216   
00217   //CONVERT_PACKED_BUFFER_TO_16_BIT(dev->depth_raw, dev->depth_frame, 11);
00218   
00219   uint8_t* depth_raw = dev->depth_raw;
00220   uint16_t* depth_frame = dev->depth_frame;
00221   const int mask = 0x7FF;
00222   int i; 
00223   int idx = 0;
00224   int bitshift = 0; 
00225   uint32_t word = 0;
00226   
00227   for (i=0; i<FREENECT_FRAME_PIX; i++) { 
00228     idx = depthImageIdx[i]; 
00229     bitshift = depthImageBitShift[i];
00230     word = (depth_raw[idx]<<16) | (depth_raw[idx+1]<<8) | depth_raw[idx+2]; 
00231     depth_frame[i] = ((word >> bitshift) & mask);
00232   }
00233   
00234         if (dev->depth_cb)
00235                 dev->depth_cb(dev, dev->depth_frame, dev->depth_stream.timestamp);
00236 }
00237 
00238 static void rgb_process(freenect_device *dev, uint8_t *pkt, int len)
00239 {
00240         int x,y,i;
00241         if (len == 0)
00242                 return;
00243 
00244         int got_frame = stream_process(&dev->rgb_stream, pkt, len);
00245 
00246         if (!got_frame)
00247                 return;
00248 
00249         //printf("GOT RGB FRAME %d/%d packets arrived, TS %08x\n", dev->rgb_stream.valid_pkts,
00250         //       dev->rgb_stream.pkts_per_frame, dev->rgb_stream.timestamp);
00251 
00252         uint8_t *rgb_frame = NULL;
00253 
00254         if (dev->rgb_format == FREENECT_FORMAT_BAYER) {
00255                 rgb_frame = dev->rgb_raw;
00256         } else {
00257                 rgb_frame = dev->rgb_frame;
00258                 /* Pixel arrangement:
00259                  * G R G R G R G R
00260                  * B G B G B G B G
00261                  * G R G R G R G R
00262                  * B G B G B G B G
00263                  * G R G R G R G R
00264                  * B G B G B G B G
00265                  */
00266     
00267     int pixelType=0;
00268     int rOffset[] = {1 , 0, -639, -640};
00269     int gOffset[] = {0 , -1, -640, 0};
00270     int bOffset[] = {640 , 639, 0, -1};
00271     
00272     uint8_t* rgb_raw = dev->rgb_raw;
00273     for (y=1; y<479; y++) {
00274       for (x=1; x<639; x++) {
00275         i = (y*640+x);
00276         pixelType = ((y&1)<<1) + (x&1);
00277         rgb_frame[3*i+0] = rgb_raw[i+rOffset[pixelType]];
00278         rgb_frame[3*i+1] = rgb_raw[i+gOffset[pixelType]];
00279         rgb_frame[3*i+2] = rgb_raw[i+bOffset[pixelType]];
00280       }
00281     }
00282         }
00283 
00284         if (dev->rgb_cb)
00285                 dev->rgb_cb(dev, rgb_frame, dev->rgb_stream.timestamp);
00286 }

00288 struct cam_hdr {
00289         uint8_t magic[2];
00290         uint16_t len;
00291         uint16_t cmd;
00292         uint16_t tag;
00293 };
00294 
00295 static void send_init(freenect_device *dev)
00296 {
00297         int i, j, ret;
00298         uint8_t obuf[0x400];
00299         uint8_t ibuf[0x200];
00300         struct cam_hdr *chdr = (void*)obuf;
00301         struct cam_hdr *rhdr = (void*)ibuf;
00302 
00303         ret = fnusb_control(&dev->usb_cam, 0x80, 0x06, 0x3ee, 0, ibuf, 0x12);
00304         //printf("First xfer: %d\n", ret);
00305 
00306         chdr->magic[0] = 0x47;
00307         chdr->magic[1] = 0x4d;
00308         
00309         for (i=0; i<num_inits; i++) {
00310                 const struct caminit *ip = &inits[i];
00311                 chdr->cmd = ip->command;
00312                 chdr->tag = ip->tag;
00313                 chdr->len = ip->cmdlen / 2;
00314                 memcpy(obuf+sizeof(*chdr), ip->cmddata, ip->cmdlen);
00315 
00316                 if( i==6 )
00317                 {
00318                         // Choose 10bit or 11 bit depth output
00319                         obuf[sizeof(*chdr) + 2] = dev->depth_format == FREENECT_FORMAT_11_BIT ? 0x03 : 0x02;
00320                 }
00321 
00322                 ret = fnusb_control(&dev->usb_cam, 0x40, 0, 0, 0, obuf, ip->cmdlen + sizeof(*chdr));
00323                 //printf("CTL CMD %04x %04x = %d\n", chdr->cmd, chdr->tag, ret);
00324                 do {
00325                         ret = fnusb_control(&dev->usb_cam, 0xc0, 0, 0, 0, ibuf, 0x200);
00326                 } while (ret == 0);
00327                 //printf("CTL RES = %d\n", ret);
00328                 if (rhdr->magic[0] != 0x52 || rhdr->magic[1] != 0x42) {
00329                         //printf("Bad magic %02x %02x\n", rhdr->magic[0], rhdr->magic[1]);
00330                         continue;
00331                 }
00332                 if (rhdr->cmd != chdr->cmd) {
00333                         //printf("Bad cmd %02x != %02x\n", rhdr->cmd, chdr->cmd);
00334                         continue;
00335                 }
00336                 if (rhdr->tag != chdr->tag) {
00337                         //printf("Bad tag %04x != %04x\n", rhdr->tag, chdr->tag);
00338                         continue;
00339                 }
00340                 if (rhdr->len != (ret-sizeof(*rhdr))/2) {
00341                         //printf("Bad len %04x != %04x\n", rhdr->len, (int)(ret-sizeof(*rhdr))/2);
00342                         continue;
00343                 }
00344                 if (rhdr->len != (ip->replylen/2) || memcmp(ibuf+sizeof(*rhdr), ip->replydata, ip->replylen)) {
00345                         //printf("Expected: ");
00346                         for (j=0; j<ip->replylen; j++) {
00347                                 //printf("%02x ", ip->replydata[j]);
00348                         }
00349                         //printf("\nGot:      ");
00350                         for (j=0; j<(rhdr->len*2); j++) {
00351                                 //printf("%02x ", ibuf[j+sizeof(*rhdr)]);
00352                         }
00353                         //printf("\n");
00354                 }
00355         }
00356         dev->cam_inited = 1;
00357 }
00358 
00359 int freenect_start_depth(freenect_device *dev)
00360 {
00361         int res;
00362   
00363   init_lookups();
00364   
00365         dev->depth_stream.buf = dev->depth_raw;
00366         dev->depth_stream.pkts_per_frame =
00367                         dev->depth_format == FREENECT_FORMAT_11_BIT ?
00368                         DEPTH_PKTS_11_BIT_PER_FRAME : DEPTH_PKTS_10_BIT_PER_FRAME;
00369         dev->depth_stream.pkt_size = DEPTH_PKTDSIZE;
00370         dev->depth_stream.synced = 0;
00371         dev->depth_stream.flag = 0x70;
00372   
00373         res = fnusb_start_iso(&dev->usb_cam, &dev->depth_isoc, depth_process, 0x82, NUM_XFERS, PKTS_PER_XFER, DEPTH_PKTBUF);
00374 
00375         if(!dev->cam_inited)
00376                 send_init(dev);
00377         return res;
00378 }
00379 
00380 int freenect_start_rgb(freenect_device *dev)
00381 {
00382         int res;
00383 
00384         dev->rgb_stream.buf = dev->rgb_raw;
00385         dev->rgb_stream.pkts_per_frame = RGB_PKTS_PER_FRAME;
00386         dev->rgb_stream.pkt_size = RGB_PKTDSIZE;
00387         dev->rgb_stream.synced = 0;
00388         dev->rgb_stream.flag = 0x80;
00389 
00390         res = fnusb_start_iso(&dev->usb_cam, &dev->rgb_isoc, rgb_process, 0x81, NUM_XFERS, PKTS_PER_XFER, RGB_PKTBUF);
00391 
00392         if(!dev->cam_inited)
00393                 send_init(dev);
00394         return res;
00395 }
